name: Slimy Crown
description:
It's a local multiplayer game for up to 4 players.

In this game you will play for the king of slimes. You can change your color and control slimes of your color. Some slimes are faster than others. (Green > Blue > Red > Pink)  To defeat other players you must remain the last in the arena.

Controls

•Player 1: W A S D & Space

•Player 2: arrow keys & right ctrl

•Player 3: 8 4 5 6 & 0 (on keypad)

•Player 4: U H J K & G

•Press Esc to pause the game
